description:
Yoko finds Rakushun in En, accepts his kindness and opens up to him.  Sugimoto feels lost without the Hinman who translates the language but nice people in En take her to the government’s office for help.  After getting a government’s pass, Yoko tries to sleep in a school and surprises Rakushun. A Kai-Kyaku teacher named Heki Rakujin tells Yoko that only the immortals and monsters have no language problems, and Yoko thinks she is a monster.  Rakushun also gives her new information about 12 kingdoms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shadow of the Moon, The Sea of Shadow - Chapter 9
Tsuki no Kage, Kage no Umi - Kyuu Shou
月の影 影の海 九章
